No. 2289/45  -  friday ,  July  22,  2022
EXTRAORDINARY
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART IV (B) — LOcAL  GOVERNmENT
Local Government Notifications
PRADEShIYA  SABhA  IBBAGAmuwA
it is hereby notified for public information that it has been adopted under resolution No. 5.10.1 moved at the General 
Conference held on 28.06.2022 at Pradeshiya Sabha Ibbagamuwa that all the roads and thoroughfares for which legal action 
had not been filed in a proper  judicial Court before the date specified  or roads and thoroughfares confirmed as the roads and 
thoroughfares that should be owned by Pradeshiya Sabha Ibbagamuwa as per the Decree of a Judicial Court in which a case 
had been filed before the said date and not mentioned in the following schedule from among the roads and thoroughfares 
given in the list of the schedule of the notification published in the Extraordinary Gazette No. 2264/31 and dated 27.01.2021 
according to the resolution No. 05/21 made at the Pradeshiya Sabha conference held  shall be confirmed as roads and 
thoroughfares owned by the Pradeshiya Sabha Ibbagamuwa in terms of orders made by the series of “ Orders on publication 
of notifications specifying preparation of plans and lists for roads and thoroughfares maintained by the Pradeshiya Sabha 
within the North Western Province” published by Extraordinary Gazette  No. 2238/35 and dated 30th July 2021 by the Hon. 
Governor in the North Western Province and in terms of the order by Section 24(1) of Pradeshiya Sabha Act, No. 15 of 1987. 
It is further notified that a list of said roads and thoroughfares has been included in the schedule hereto and all the  
roads and thoroughfares mentioned in that schedule shall be considered as roads and thoroughfares owned by the Pradeshiya 
Sabha Ibbagamuwa under Sub Section (5) of Section 24 of Pradeshiya Sabha Act.  
Ajith Kumar wikramashingha,
Chairman,
Pradeshiya Sabha Ibbagamuwa.
06th July, 2022 
At the Head Office, 
Pradeshiya  Sabha Ibbagamuwa.
 
1A- PG 5927  - 07 (07/2022) 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk

Part IV (B) - GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIST REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA - 22.07.2022
2aResolution
Pradeshiya Sabha Ibbagamuwa following schedule from among the roads and thoroughfares given in the list of the schedule of the notification published in the 
Extraordinary Gazette dated 16.12.2021 according to the resolution No. 05/21 made at the Pradeshiya Sabha conference held on 12.10.2021, shall be confirmed as 
roads and thoroughfares owned by the Pradeshiya Sabha Ibbagamuwa in terms of orders made by the series of “ Orders on publication of notifications specifying 
preparation of plans and lists for roads and thoroughfares maintained by the Pradeshiya Sabha within the North Western Province” published by Extraordinary  
Gazette No. 2238/35 and dated 30th July 2021 by the Hon. Governor in the North Western Province and in terms of the order by Section 24(1) of Pradeshiya Sabha 
Act No. 15 of 1987,
